title: Search not indexing bug number
desc: You can't search the identifying bug number, you can only search the title and description of the bugs. Its wierd because I added an index field in the Mongoose Schema for it. Does it only index over text instead of numbers? Should the bug number be stored as a string in the Schema?

title: Footer doesn't reach bottom of page on large screens
desc: On screens larger than 1000px the footer doesn't go to the bottom of the screen. I think its a problem with Bootstrap

title: Sidebar animation not working
desc: For some reason the sidebar animation does not play when opened. Maybe its a problem with my browser?

title: Removing bugs does not update the bug count
desc: All removing a bug does is delete it, it doesn't change the number of bugs shown on the project page.
You can't search the identifying bug number, you can only search the title and description of the bugs.
